Though this game is a bit dated, it still seems to wow many players with its graphics and storyline. The perilous adventures of Gordon Freeman continue in this sequel to a best-seller in 1998. Both of these games introduced state-of-the-art physics and graphics for their time period.

Half-Life 2 was also the first Vavle game created with the latest iteration of the Source Engine (as of 2004). Half-Life 2 provides hours of fun as Gordon Freeman fights his way through the Combine soldiers with an entire arsenal of weaponry, including a prototype weapon, the Zero-Point-Energy Field Manipulator, or more commonly known as, the Gravity Gun.
   
Half-Life 2 was a huge success, and in the 2 following years, Valve released Episode 1 and 2, which added even more action as our favorite theoretical physicist battles many more Combine threats, and forces him to rely more on the abilities of his HEV suit and the weapons on his back. I can't wait for Valve's next title: Half-Life 3, coming summer 2082.

This game is full of bugs. One should think they could have fixed it in the last ten years. But no - I couldn't even processed with cheats activated. I compared what happened in my game with what SHOULD happen in YouTube walkthroughs. Complete different! Even when I replayed that level it didn't work! Just annoying! - Don't buy it!
10/10 would absolutely recommend.

One of the best and finest first-person shooters Valve has to offer. The story is very moving, the characters are very charming, the level design is very creative. Well worth the price and is highly recommended if you're the kind of guy who loves shooters, aliens, explosions, etc.

A perfect game.That is how I call HL2 on my second play through. 
10/10 Will play it again after a while.
Great game that seamlessly combines puzzles and combat with a enveloping story and mechanics. Truly the paragon of all Valve games.

This game is really one of a kind. Sure its just another 1st person shooter. Except it really isnt. It has an excellent story, physics, and AI. It allows you to tear apart the world and use it as a WEAPON. Throw stuff at an advanced alien life form, a horde of zombies, or even anything else! It is also supported by a everlasting community which makes excellent mods which add-on to the already great game. Good job Valve, now we just need a third installment. Buy it, Play it, and Have fun with it.

Ha a Half-Life 2-t nem vitted végig, nem játszottál vele, vagy nem ismered, nem vagy igazi gamer. Ha neked nincs meg a Half-Life 2 PC-re, konzolra, mikróra, vagy mosógépre, azonnal meg kell venned. Ha azt sem tudod mi az a Half-Life, az legalább akkora főbűn mint ha nem tudnád mikor koronázták meg István királyt. Ha sem ez az értékelés, sem mások értékelése, se a képek, se a videók nem győztek meg, abban az esetben nálad komoly mentális zavarok léphettek fel. Javasolt az azonnali kivizsgálás!

[h1]Un pilastro del videogioco moderno[/h1]

-[b]Grafica mozzafiato[/b] (per essere un gioco di 15 anni fa), comincia a notarsi la bassa densità poligonale in generale

-[b]Gameplay:[/b] inizialmente potrebbe sembrare un fps generico in cui si spara e basta, ma è molto più vario siccome ogni arma è utilissima e unica, inoltre il gioco è ricco di armi non convenzionali e metodi creativi per uccidere i nemici (abbastanza vari anche essi tra mostri/umani)
Ci sono parti puzzle abbastanza banali (come complessità) ma abbastanza creative da essere memorabili. Da notare anche le ottime sequenze in moto d'acqua.
In generale il gameplay (pur essendo ottimo) non è mai eccellente, ma il susseguirsi di attività in maniera equilibrata e il ritmo perfetto elevano Half Life 2 a capolavoro

-[b]Fisica:[/b] Motore fisico sfruttato al 100% sia per fare kill creative, sia per crearsi percorsi per andare avanti nel gioco

Probabilmente è il gioco che sfrutta meglio il motore fisico integrandolo direttamente nel gameplay ( e non solo nelle cutscene o tanto per abbellire la scena)

-[b]Storia[/b] immersiva raccontata in tempo reale, senza cutscene e interruzioni (come Bioshock)

-[b]Comparto sonoro [/b] avanzatissimo e per nulla obsoleto, suoni definiti e perfetti, mixaggio perfetto, è facilissimo capire da quale direzione proviene il suono, è facilissimo riconoscere l'oggetto che provoca il suono e il materiale di cui è fatto

-[b]Controlli responsivi[/b] e identici a qualsiasi altro gioco Source

Assolutamente consigliato

Half - Life 2 była moją pierwszą grą na mój pierwszy komputer. Zaskawiwała ona wszystkich swoją grafiką, fabułą jak i ścieżką dzwiękową. Dzisiaj po prawie 10 latach chciałem odświerzyć sobie pamięć i zagrałem w ją. Moje pierwsze wrażenia- mimo iż jest ona jeszcze na starym silniku graficznym nadal zaskakuje grafiką jak i fabułą oraz dzwiękiem. Cóż by tu dalej mówić- gra warta kupna- jest tania ciekawa i ładna. Szkoda jednak, że Valve póki co nie zbiera się do wydania 3 części tej wspaniałej gry.

UPDATE: Знал, что у многих бомбанет. Но то, что простительно для HL (1998г.), непростительно для HL2 (2004г). Факт. Несогласные могут и дальше продолжать хавать рельсы.

This is my VR review using Oculus Rift. 

Cons
Playing Vr really shows the flaws of an older game. Akward jumping off of thin platforms is a bad design flaw. You do it mildly in the beginning, but then towards the end, it becomes a chore. Aside from that, the melee combat is too simplistic. For something that relies heavlily on close quarters combat, with creatures constantly jumping at your face, a slingle attack button does not cut it. 

Pros
Aside from that, the engine still holds up. Mainly because of the art style and facial animation. The weapons are unique to the level, which helps mix up the gameplay challenges. Levels also have a personality of their own. I havn't really played other games with worlds like City 17. I think the haunting atmosphere is what sets HL2 apart from most shooters. 

I played this game with several periferals over the years. The keyboard and mouse, Xbox 360 controller, ps3, ps4 dualshocks,  mini keyboards with gyro mise and now the Rift. 

VR
There are a lot of wow moments. The ones that stand out most are the Alien scenes where you feel like their eyeballs are popping out of their heads when closing in on their personal space. Also when you kill a crab creature its fun to stare into it's mouth. There's a scene that reminds me of War of The Worlds where you are fighting tall stalky insect looking creatures. You get a sense like you are playing in a 50's scifi movie. Lastly, the mission where you get your last upgrade for the gravity gun had a cool 3d effect. The orbital balls that shoot out of your gun look amazing and ad to the immersion. 
I also thought it was cool to look down cliffs. I sometimes would commit suicide just to scare myself. I made my mom try it and she pannict and tried to take the Rift off her face. 

If you wanted to nitpick the VR, I guess you could run into problems with feeling sick at first, maybe the 720p is a bit blurry when zoomed into your face, screen door effect is there but never bothered me. 

........
For improvements in Half Life 3 or reboot, I'd like to see fixes on the core gameplay. The melee system needs to be more robust. Put in a hp, lp, hk,lk system. For platforms, we need a parkour system where it's easy to pull yourself up ledges. The suit should also give you powers like rocket boosting/ jetpack. Maybe the suit should have gadgets that a secret agent would use. If you ever get lost, the suit could also act as a compass. Lastly I would like to see puzzles return. This is something that helped mixed up the shooting sections. 

Overall score 8.5/10

Variety: 8/10

Half Life 2 è un gioco fantastico.
L'ho comprato con i saldi estivi ad 1,99 € ma secondo me vale anche al prezzo pieno di 7€. 
Per essere un gioco del 2004 ha una grafica pazzesca, una trama fantastica e abbastanza lunga, un sacco di armi ed un'ambientazione vasta e spettacolare. Inoltre non è come uno di quegli sparatutto da 50€ nei quali il solo obbiettivo è quello di uccidere ed andare avanti. No, Half Life 2 è un gioco coinvolgente ed impegnativo, nel quale vengono richieste varie abilità per proseguire, come ad esempio la logica e l'intuito. 
In conclusione Half Life 2 fa parte della storia dei videogiochi, ed ancora oggi, a quasi 10 anni dalla sua data di rilascio, resta secondo me uno dei migliori giochi che si possono trovare su Steam, quindi vale veramente la pena giocarci.

Para aquellos vaguetes que tengan pereza de leer todo el análisis: Half Life 2 es la meca de los gamers y un juego totalmente obligatorio si has jugado su primera entrenga.

Los gráficos, obviamente, han mejorado aumentando así la jugabilidad ya que en su primera entrega los anticuados gráficos podían dificultar ciertas fases. Los mapas se han abierto mucho más, la inteligencia artificial de los enemigos ha mejorado y se ha vuelto ligeramente más dificil. En ciertos capítulos y momentos determinados conserva ese factor de terror que le da tanta personalidad. El argumento del juego es sin duda el punto mas fuerte del juego, debes meterte de lleno en la historia para sacar el máximo provecho al juego. Si finalmente decides jugar a esta maravilla veras en seguida la necesidad de comprar Half Life episode One y Half Life episode Two.
Очень радует великолепное сочетание геймплея и сюжета, плюс актуальная и на сегодняшний день графика, а также прекрасное и очень атмосферное музыкальное сопровождение.

Bref, je vous remercie, développeurs de chez Valve, mais j'ai une question: QUAND ALLEZ VOUS NOUS SORTIR CE FOUTU HALF-LIFE 3 ?!

This is not a 'game'. This is a way of life. It will grab you by the nether regions and take you on a rollercoaster ride to Ravenholm and back. Tremble with fear as the screams of those terrifying fast zombie things echo in your ears. Sigh with relief as you take out you first strider, only to realise there are 3 more. Laugh at Eli Vance's stupid voice and the way he is carried around in a pod for half the game. So if you haven't played this game, wake up and smell the ashes.

This is truly an exceptional game franchise.  In a vast sea of FPS action games, this is, without a doubt, the best one around.  Not only is shooting the combine fun and challenging, but the game also offers various puzzles and a rich story as well.  Between my xbox 360 and PC both,  I've easily put over 300 hours into these Half-Life games.   The Half-Life Franchise is most definately one game that is worth every penny and truly deserves its cult-like following.

Without a doubt, this is my favorite video game EVER. Despite being about 10 years old, nothing about the game seems very dated, and offers the perfect balance of FPS action, dialogue, emotion, puzzles, and story, as well as a high re-playability value (Not to mention an excellent and unique soundtrack). Each chapter brings new challenges, weapons, environments, feelings, and enemies that couldn't possibly be replicated anywhere else, and held at a very reasonable price. If I am not mistaken, a purchase of Half-Life 2 also comes with Half-Life 2: Lost Coast, which is a single chapter cut from the game (the stand alone price for Lost Coast is $40, DON'T FALL FOR IT).
A side note from myself:
If you are new to the franchise, I would recommend at the very least watching a few YouTube videos about the first game Half-Life before you play Half-Life 2, even though the plots are very different and you could still understand the context without it, I think the foreknowledge does nothing but add to the richness of the gaming experience packed in this wonder of ones and zeros.
